name: Prototype of 3rd Person Puzzle Platformer AKA Assignment 6
name_original: Prototype of 3rd Person Puzzle Platformer AKA Assignment 6
description:
This is a short quick Unity 3d game I made for Game Tech II

it features some semblance of AI, a gun that does something unexpected,

and uses the triggeredMotion system that I designed the puzzles around.

its only like 5 levels but Im proud of what I made, especially considering I made it in about 36 hours.
